title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel not working?
body: So, been trying to get into League this morning and i keep getting this pop up saying that PVP.net stopped working and windows will close the program and tell me if a solution is there. I tried reinstalling and i still get the same thing.

replies.body:
Pather Kernel errors are typically caused when League isn't assigned proper system permissions by the operating system. Since League relies on a lot of files and software packages outside of the League directory, it needs to be assigned permissions to interact with them. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) addresses the most common solutions for this issue. 

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through those steps.
